general.email-is-not-valid: The email you entered is not valid
general.capcha-load-error: There was a problem loading the captcha, please refresh the page
general.try-again-in-a-second: Please wait a moment and try again.
general.missing-required-data: You have not entered the required information, please try again.
general.unknown-problem: An unknown problem has occurred, please try again.

reset-password-email-html.subject: Reset Password
reset-password-email-html.description: A password reset request has been submitted for your account
reset-password-email-html.button-description: Click the button below to set a new password
reset-password-email-html.expire-time: This link is valid for 1 hour
reset-password-email-html.if-not-you: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email

copy.error-while-copying-to-clipboard: There was a problem, we can't copy.

code-responses.FORM_HAS_ERRORS: The form contains errors. Please fix them and try again.
code-responses.INTERNAL_ERROR: A problem occurred, please try again
code-responses.AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED: You must be logged in to access this section
code-responses.THIS_METHOD_HTTP_IS_NOT_SUPPORTED_ON_THI: This HTTP method is not supported on this endpoint.
code-responses.THIS_ENDPOINT_ONLY_ACCEPTS_REQUESTS_WITH: This endpoint only accepts requests with valid JSON in the body.
code-responses.THE_REQUESTED_ENDPOINT_DOES_NOT_EXISTS: The requested endpoint does not exist.
code-responses.TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Your access has been blocked due to repeated attempts. Please try again in a few minutes
code-responses.MINIMUM_LENGTH_NOT_REACHED: Input is shorter than the minimum allowed length
code-responses.MAXIMUM_LENGTH_EXCEEDED: Input exceeds the maximum allowed length
code-responses.SLUG_IS_TAKEN: This Slug is taken, try something else
code-responses.RESET_PASSWORD_URL_SENT_SUCCESSFULLY: A password reset link will be sent to your email if the email exists.
code-responses.RESET_PASSWORD_INVALID_EMAIL: The email you sent is not valid
code-responses.INVOICE_CREATION_FAILED: There was a problem creating the invoice, please try again.
code-responses.UNSUPPORTED_GATEWAY: The requested gateway is disabled or invalid.
code-responses.AMOUNT_BELOW_MINIMUM: The minimum amount is not met.
code-responses.AMOUNT_EXCEEDS_MAXIMUM: The maximum amount is not met.
code-responses.PAYMENT_VERIFICATION_FAILED: There was a problem with Transaction verification has occurred
code-responses.PAYMENT_VERIFICATION_FAILED_BY_GATEWAY: Your transaction has been declared unsuccessful by the gateway, if the amount has been deducted from your account, please wait 30 minutes and if it is not returned by the system, contact support
code-responses.PAYMENT_VERIFICATION_NEED_MORE_TIME: Transaction verification requires more time. Your transaction status is automatically checked every 10 minutes and after final verification, the paid amount will be added to your wallet.
code-responses.PAYMENT_VERIFICATION_PARTIAL: The transaction was not confirmed due to a discrepancy in the payment amount. Please contact support to review and resolve the problem.
code-responses.PAYMENT_GATEWAY_CREATE_ERROR: There was a problem creating the invoice, please try again
code-responses.PAYMENT_GATEWAY_VERIFY_ERROR: There was a problem In confirming the transaction.
code-responses.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_REQUIRED: To access this section, you must first verify your email from the 'Settings' page
code-responses.API_KEY_GENERATED: Your new API key has been generated.
code-responses.USERNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: Username is already registered by someone else
code-responses.NEW_USERNAME_IS_SAME_AS_CURRENT_USERNAME: New username must be different from previous username
code-responses.PASSWORD_CHANGED: Password updated, you will be redirected to the login page...
code-responses.NEW_PASSWORD_IS_MISSING: New password must not be empty
code-responses.OLD_PASSWORD_IS_MISSING: Current password must not be empty
code-responses.PASSWORDS_DO_NOT_MATCH: Password and password confirmation do not match
code-responses.SIGN_UP_REQUIRED: Account not found, please complete the registration form
code-responses.LOGOUT_SUCCESSFULLY: You have logged out with your account
code-responses.SEND_EMAIL_SUCCESS: An email has been sent to you, please check your Inbox and Spam.
code-responses.MAXIMUM_STORE_LIMIT_EXCESSES: Your number of stores has reached the maximum allowed number
code-responses.PASSWORD_NOT_STRONG: You have chosen a weak password, your account is not secure like this; please change it
code-responses.PASSWORD_STRONG_VERIFICATION_LOWERCASE_N: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
code-responses.PASSWORD_STRONG_VERIFICATION_UPPERCASE_N: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
code-responses.PASSWORD_STRONG_VERIFICATION_DIGIT_NOT_F: Password must contain at least one number
code-responses.PASSWORD_STRONG_VERIFICATION_SPECIAL_CHA: Password must contain at least one special character
code-responses.PASSWORD_STRONG_VERIFICATION_LENGTH_TOO_: Password must be at least 8 characters
